snippet.title: World of Tanks: Modern Armor
snippet.description:
Commanders! It’s time to roll out!
Get ready to experience the world’s most powerful modern and historic war machines in World of Tanks: Modern Armor!
Take control of the battlefield, disengage the enemy, and immerse yourself in brutal warfare as you lead your team to victory. 
With over 800+ customizable tanks, 4 entirely new maps, and more, a new epic battle is only just beginning!
